resources.string: Be Careful Navigating this week, The heavens are tumultuous!
The heavens are in your favor, you shall take the world!
Take no steps forward without a friend at each side!
Perhaps you could think this over a bit longer.
Indeed, it would be wise to act now while the heavens prevail!
There has been an error, check the logs.
This is a link to Douglas Smiths Blog

The Ancient Norse believed that there were mystical elderly women that controlled the fates of everything living on the planet. They would use the planets to make some of their predictions about the world, and the end of the world, at Ragnarok. This app uses APIs to check astrological statuses and tell you if you should be making big decisions in your life!
